column1: #Text=US Secretary of Defense Donald Rumsfeld visits Brazil

#Text=[ [ w : Brazil | Brazil ] ] — Tuesday ( March 22 ) the United States Secretary of Defense Donald Rumsfeld arrived in Brazil for a visit with Brazilian President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva , Vice-President and Defense Minister José Alencar , and other top officials .

#Text=In a meeting with President Lula DaSilva and his Vice-President and Minister of Defense , José Alencar , Mr Rumsfeld discussed Brazil leading the UN military forces in Haiti , terrorism and narcotrafficking .

#Text=Rumsfeld told to AFP journalists : " The United States has put forward four topics , which we have agreed to take up : application of a law to down [ drug traffickers ' aircraft ] ; [ UN ] operations in Haiti ; drug trafficking ; and the fight against terrorism , including Brazil 's position on security in South America .
